trans-unit.source: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A printable machine learning algorithm cheat sheet helps you choose the right algorithm for your predictive model in Azure Machine Learning Studio.
trans-unit.target: A printable machine learning algorithm cheat sheet helps you choose the right algorithm for your predictive model in Azure Machine Learning Studio.

trans-unit.source: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio
trans-unit.target: Machine learning algorithm cheat sheet for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Studio

trans-unit.source: The **Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet** helps you choose the right machine learning algorithm for your predictive analytics solutions from the Microsoft Azure Machine Learning library of algorithms.
trans-unit.target: The **Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet** helps you choose the right machine learning algorithm for your predictive analytics solutions from the Microsoft Azure Machine Learning library of algorithms.

trans-unit.source: [Azure Machine Learning Studio](https://studio.azureml.net/) comes with a large number of machine learning algorithms for your predictive analytics solutions.
trans-unit.target: [Azure Machine Learning Studio](https://studio.azureml.net/) comes with a large number of machine learning algorithms for your predictive analytics solutions.

trans-unit.source: These algorithms fall into the general machine learning categories of ***regression***, ***classification***, ***clustering***, and ***anomaly detection***, and each one is designed to address a different type of machine learning problem.
trans-unit.target: These algorithms fall into the general machine learning categories of ***regression***, ***classification***, ***clustering***, and ***anomaly detection***, and each one is designed to address a different type of machine learning problem.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] See the article [How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning](machine-learning-algorithm-choice.md) for a detailed guide to using this cheat sheet.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] See the article [How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning](machine-learning-algorithm-choice.md) for a detailed guide to using this cheat sheet.

trans-unit.source: Download the machine learning algorithm cheat sheet
trans-unit.target: Download the machine learning algorithm cheat sheet

trans-unit.source: Download the Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet and get help figuring out how to choose a machine learning algorithm for your solution.
trans-unit.target: Download the Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet and get help figuring out how to choose a machine learning algorithm for your solution.

trans-unit.source: To keep it nearby, you can print the cheat sheet in tabloid size (11 x 17 in.).
trans-unit.target: To keep it nearby, you can print the cheat sheet in tabloid size (11 x 17 in.).

trans-unit.source: Download the cheat sheet here: [Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet](http://download.microsoft.com/download/A/6/1/A613E11E-8F9C-424A-B99D-65344785C288/microsoft-machine-learning-algorithm-cheat-sheet-v6.pdf)
trans-unit.target: Download the cheat sheet here: [Microsoft Azure Machine Learning Algorithm Cheat Sheet](http://download.microsoft.com/download/A/6/1/A613E11E-8F9C-424A-B99D-65344785C288/microsoft-machine-learning-algorithm-cheat-sheet-v6.pdf)

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning Algorithm cheat sheet: Learn how to choose a Machine Learning algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning Algorithm cheat sheet: Learn how to choose a Machine Learning algorithm.

trans-unit.source: For a deeper discussion of the different types of machine learning algorithms, how they're used, and how to use this cheat sheet for choosing the right algorithm, see [How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning](machine-learning-algorithm-choice.md).
trans-unit.target: For a deeper discussion of the different types of machine learning algorithms, how they're used, and how to use this cheat sheet for choosing the right algorithm, see [How to choose algorithms for Microsoft Azure Machine Learning](machine-learning-algorithm-choice.md).

trans-unit.source: For a list by category of all the machine learning algorithms available in Machine Learning Studio, see [Initialize Model][initialize-model] in the Machine Learning Studio Algorithm and Module Help.
trans-unit.target: For a list by category of all the machine learning algorithms available in Machine Learning Studio, see [Initialize Model][initialize-model] in the Machine Learning Studio Algorithm and Module Help.

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of algorithms and modules in Machine Learning Studio, see [A-Z list of Machine Learning Studio modules][a-z-list] in Machine Learning Studio Algorithm and Module Help.
trans-unit.target: For a complete list of algorithms and modules in Machine Learning Studio, see [A-Z list of Machine Learning Studio modules][a-z-list] in Machine Learning Studio Algorithm and Module Help.
